attributes.action: I would like the Prime Minister to resign following the expenses scandal and the mess the government is in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Resignation of the Prime Minister: I would like the Prime Minister (Gordon Brown) to resign following the expenses scandal and the mess that the government is in i believe that the PM has not done the country much good and that his time in office is over.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
